name: esnext-example
description: Example block written with ESNext standard and JSX support â€“ build step required.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.setup: composer install && npm run generate-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && npm run server:start && npm run permalinks
scripts.start: npm run browser-sync & npm run tailwind:watch
scripts.clean: npx wp-env clean && npm run server:stop && rm -rf node_modules wordpress vendor
scripts.server:start: npx wp-env start && npm run permalinks && npm run install:gutenberg
scripts.install:gutenberg: npx wp-env run cli wp plugin install gutenberg && npx wp-env run cli wp plugin activate gutenberg
scripts.make:pot: wp i18n make-pot ./ ./languages/$npm_package_config_text_domain.pot --headers='{"Last-Translator":"The WordPress Contributors <yourname@yourwebsite.com>","Language-Team":"The WordPress Contributors <yourname@yourwebsite.com>"}' --exclude=src && cp ./languages/$npm_package_config_text_domain.pot ./languages/$npm_package_config_text_domain-$npm_package_config_language.po
scripts.permalinks: wp-env run cli wp rewrite structure /%postname%/ --hard
scripts.svn:add: cd svn && svn add trunk/* && svn add assets/* && svn add branches && svn add tags/*
scripts.svn:tag: cd svn && svn cp trunk tags/$npm_package_version
